prompts: Create a sleek, fire-type Pokemon with a slender body and vibrant pink accents.
I want a dragon-like creature that thrives in urban areas, with dark scales and fiery breath.
Generate a unique Pokemon that embodies both elegance and danger, showcasing vivid colors.
Make a character that resembles a lizard, with a striking red tail and bright eyes.
Imagine a powerful yet cunning Pokemon that dominates the desert landscape with its fiery presence.
Design a creature with a stealthy appearance, perfect for ambush attacks in lush forests.
Show me a Pokemon that blends well into rocky terrains, sporting a dark and colorful palette.
